Names of Divine Child.quote: "For to us a child is born, to us a son is given... and his name shall be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace." (Isaiah 9:6)

Divine Offspring.quote: "I have said, 'You are gods, children of the Most High, all of you.'" (Psalm 82:6)

Divine Birth.quote: "The Word became flesh and made his dwelling among us." (John 1:14)

Divine Childhood.quote: "Krishna, the divine child, played among the cowherds of Vrindavan." (Bhagavata Purana 10.8)

Divine Innocence.quote: "Unless you change and become like little children, you will never enter the kingdom of heaven." (Matthew 18:3)

Divine Son.quote: "You are my Son; today I have become your Father." (Psalm 2:7)

Divine Daughter.quote: "Kanya Kumari, the virgin goddess, eternal divine daughter." (Tamil tradition)

Child Avatars.quote: "The divine child Murugan, born of wisdom-fire, emerged to lead the celestial forces." (Skanda Purana)

Divine Play.quote: "The child Krishna's divine play (lila) reveals cosmic truths through innocent games." (Bhagavata Purana)

Child Saints.quote: "Even as a child he was filled with the Holy Spirit." (Luke 1:15)

Divine Education.quote: "And Jesus grew in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and man." (Luke 2:52)

Divine Qualities.quote: "The divine child embodies perfect wisdom in innocent form." (Tibetan Buddhism)

Sacred Childhood.quote: "The child is father of the man." (William Wordsworth, inspired by divine vision)

Divine Growth.quote: "The child grew and became strong in spirit." (Luke 1:80)

Divine Mission.quote: "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart." (Jeremiah 1:5)

Divine Teachings.quote: "Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings you have prepared praise." (Matthew 21:16)

Divine Heritage.quote: "See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God!" (1 John 3:1)

Divine Potential.quote: "The kingdom of God belongs to such as these." (Mark 10:14)

Child Manifestation.quote: "The divine child manifests to restore dharma and bring joy." (Hindu tradition)

Divine Wonder.quote: "And a little child shall lead them in paths of peace." (Isaiah 11:6)

Sacred Birth.quote: "Born not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God." (John 1:13)

Divine Symbolism.quote: "The child represents the perfect union of heaven and earth." (Carl Jung, on the divine child archetype)

Child Wisdom.quote: "The pure heart of a child reflects divine wisdom." (Zen teaching)

Divine Purpose.quote: "This child is destined to cause the falling and rising of many." (Luke 2:34)

Divine Nature.quote: "As children of light, walk in the light." (Ephesians 5:8)

Sacred Inheritance.quote: "If we are children, then we are heirsâ€”heirs of God and co-heirs with Christ." (Romans 8:17)

Divine Recognition.quote: "Out of Egypt I called my son." (Hosea 11:1)

Divine Promise.quote: "I will be a Father to you, and you will be my sons and daughters." (2 Corinthians 6:18)

Sacred Journey.quote: "The child increased in wisdom and in years, and in divine and human favor." (Luke 2:52)
